title: 297: CHATTY BROS: Heated BIP Takes & Making Good on A Bet!
itunes:title: 297: CHATTY BROS: Heated BIP Takes & Making Good on A Bet!
description:
The Bros are back and first Evan and Grayston have to make good on a Bachelor bet they lost! Then they dive into their strong opinions about the recent BIP drama - and have a Star Wars tangent because…well…they’re the Bros.

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***PILL CLUB: go to THEPILLCLUB.COM/CHATTY

***GIRLFRIEND COLLECTIVE: first-time customers get $25 off purchases of $100 or more when you go to GIRLFRIEND.COM/CHATTY

***GREEN CHEF: Go to GREENCHEF.COM/CHATTY100 and use code CHATTY100 to get $100 off including free shipping! 

***GROVE:  go to GROVE.COM/CHATTY to choose a FREE starter set with your first order!

***ETTITUDE: get 20% off your order, plus free shipping at ETTITUDE.COM/CHATTY and enter promo code CHATTY

***PELOTON: New members can try Peloton classes free for 30 days at ONEPELOTON.COM/APP

FOLLOW THE CHATTY BROS HERE:
